name: JDI-01
details:
DI boxImpedance matcher with speaker simulation, COMBO / 4 * 12 speaker analog selection, 15K ohm LINE IN input, 600 ohm balanced XLR output, can be connected to the speaker after the output (when you select this connection, you must connect the speaker or so Effective load), with Ground lift switch, you can use the 9V power supply or 48V phantom power.
Size: 11.8 (length) X6.4 (height) X3.8 (width) cm
Weight: 0.38KG 
Clean sounding DI box with amp simulation
4x12 Guitar Cab (speaker simulation) switch
15k Ohm IN, 600 Ohm balanced XLR OUT
Ground lift switch, 9V DC and +48V Phantom Power
Connect to amp's speaker out for line level conversion
